entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 12 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 24. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 10.
